nodes.text: Son-tuul was a jungle planet located in the Outer Rim Territories' Albarrio sector. It was the base of the Son-tuul Pride, a criminal organization and one of the five syndicates. Darth Vader attacked the Son-tuul Pride and liberated its cache of credits. A group of mercenaries then met at a cantina on the planet to steal those credits from Vader's forces. Later on, a new crew of mercenaries, led by Chelli Aphra, was formed by the Son-tuul Pride to search for their leader 0-0-0's memories. Shortly after they were recovered, the Empire attacked and destroyed the Son-tuul Pride. 0-0-0 survived and left the planet to search for Aphra.

Son-tuul was a planet covered in vast jungles, forests, and mountains. Located in the Outer Rim Territories' Albarrio sector, it had a breathable atmosphere. Its settlements were built between the trees with rope bridges and spiral stairs around them and were regularly patrolled by Imperial stormtroopers. Son-tuul was also home to the Son-tuul Pride, a crime syndicate and the sixth member of the Five syndicates. Their main base was based within the jungles of Son-tuul.
